title: Acoustic - Volume 2
description: 12 intimate and friendly acoustic themes with multiple loops and short edits
longDescription:
Also take a look at "Acoustic - Volume 1"


Preview the collection:

  • YouTube


"Acoustic - Volume 2" features 12 acoustic music themes suitable for intimate and friendly projects.

These themes are suitable for your visual novels, rpg, casual games, children related projects and many more.

Every track comes with multiple loops and shorter edits for a total amount of 936Mb of music.


  • Morning In The Woods: Full length (02:13), 4 Short edits, 11 Loops
  • Gentle Breeze: Full length (02:20), 4 Short edits, 12 Loops
  • Folk Love Vibes: Full length (01:11), 3 Short edits, 6 Loops
  • Days In The Countryside: Full length (02:23), 4 Short edits, 14 Loops
  • Bright World: Full length (01:26), 3 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Light Leaves: Full length (02:11), 4 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Motivated By Nature: Full length (02:09), 4 Short edits, 13 Loops
  • River Flowing: Full length (02:10), 4 Short edits, 6 Loops
  • Traveling Across Nature: Full length (02:05), 4 Short edits, 12 Loops
  • Folksy Orchestral: Full length (01:42), 3 Short edits, 8 Loops
  • Bicycle Rides: Full length (02:13), 4 Short edits, 8 Loops
  • Fresh Feeling: Full length (02:00), 2 Short edits, 6 Loops
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  12 Full length
  •  39 Short edits
  •  106 Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 161

Number of Audio Cues: 161

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 93min 57sec

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
